EmailTemplate.name: New User SSO
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Kukulu Single Sign-On!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!User.FirstName},
Please copy and paste the following link into your web browser to access the application via Single Sign-On (SSO):
https://sts.manulife.com/adfs/ls/IdpInitiatedSignOn.aspx?LoginToRp=https://kukulu.lightning.force.com
Take the following steps to save the above URL as a Bookmark in your browser so that you can easily access Salesforce.com in the future: (steps below are customize for Google Chrome, steps for other browsers may vary)
1. Click the star icon found at the far right side of the address bar
2. Click in the 'Name' field and type the name you wish for it to be called (e.g. "Kukulu SSO")
3. Ensure that "Bookmarks Bar" is the selected folder
4. Click "Finished"
Please notify your Salesforce Administrator for any login issues.
Need to merge your Trailhead Accounts for Trail Tracker? Click here for instructions.
